reviews.sentence: Convenient location. I have stayed at this location before. This was the first time I had a studio. The studio comes equipped with dish towels utensils and plates which I did not use but they are available. I stayed over the New Years Eve and Day weekend. There was an issue with the remote and the front desk reps resolved it quickly. I did hear loud voices and arguing at around midnight at New Years but they were quieted without taking too much time. Overall good stay and I will get the studio if I stay here again.

Great hotel but shady location. Stayed 7 nights. All is great about the hotel but the neighborhood and some long term guests they have. Great customer service room property amenities but the hotel is in a shady area. They have security cameras all over and upscale neighborhoods are few mins walking. But that street and the several shady long time residents make me downgrade it.
spacious living area even has a dish washer. Nice confortable room suite 300 sqft with couch and table area.

Front Desk struggling with Guests Security. We stayed on second floor there is no elevator. The room was comfortable enough and the rooms faced the courtyard which was lovely with flowers and tastefully landscaped. The front desk people are rather disorganized. They had booked our room to another party the second night while we were there. I was in the room when I heard someone else trying to get in with a card key. Thankfully I had deadbolt the lock but I was really scared that I could be accosted. I told the front desk about this incident. They said it happens sometimes. I asked if I was not there and someone else had access to my room I could have all my stuff stolen. They did not seemed concerned. They said when this happens people come back and ask for a different room YIKES. If the front desk changes their procedures it would be a better place to stay.
great hotel. the hotel was really nice. the room was clean and the staff was friendly and courageous. the room wa very well appointed.

Comfortable but loud. This would have been a much nicer stay if the walls were insulated. We could hear our neighbors talking and there was a lot of activity in the early morning hours right outside our door. The room was comfortable and had a clean kitchenette. They do not serve any kind of breakfast but they have coffee in the morning. They only provided soap. It was conveniently located near bike paths the botanical gardens zoo and central to a lot of the fields for spring training.

Nice Place. Clean nice furnishings very comfortable bed. We only stayed one night but the kitchenette would have been nice for a longer stay full size fridge freezer stovetop etc. Even though there was a cofemaker you need to bring your own coffee however. The pool fountains grounds were also nice. For a Motel 6 extended stay Studio 6 we were very pleasantly surprised would recommend stay as there again.
No toaster old tv very clean and great pool.

Paradise Living. The location was excellent. Near shopping centers and restaurants. I have been in 5 different hotels in the past two months because my grandson is at Intensive Care Unit at the Phoenix Childrens Hospital and Studio 6 beats them all. it is only 8 10 minutes to the hospital and it is right off AZ 51 which takes you easily to I10 West or East. I highly recommend Studio 6 to friends and family. Planning on staying again on my next visit.

Paradise Living. The location was excellent. Near shopping centers and restaurants. I have been in 5 different hotels in the past two months because my grandson is at Intensive Care Unit at the Phoenix Childrens Hospital and Studio 6 beats them all. it is only 8 10 minutes to the hospital and it is right off AZ 51 which takes you easily to I10 West or East. I highly recommend Studio 6 to friends and family. Planning on staying again on my next visit.

Good value for the price. I had stay there again. The staff was very friendly and inviting. He did a great job. There was no iron or ironing board in the room I had business attire to iron. Also the bathroom sink was slow draining.

Although the rate was a bit low but I will never book again in this property. We were first given a smoking room so we requested to be transfered to a non smoking. The room still had a smell of cigarette smoke but alot better than the first. No hangers in the closet no small fridge towels placed in rhe room looked dirty.

Read above again. Our 4 day reservation at one of Scotsdales busiest times was cancelled without any reason or notification given to us. With our flight getting in close to midnight we strongly insisted that they find us a room for the night. In the morning we find out that with bokingcom you need to give a credit card number if you are checking in after midnight. Kind of important information. We had to search the next morning for a place for the next 3 nights and had to pay substantially more than what we originally budgeted. Not happy.

Pretty run down hotel. We found this hotel for cheap last minute when our plans changed. I did nt want to spend 120 for a single night stay. 80 for the night was nt any better though for this place. Loud guests barking dogs screaming children no fridge or microwave or coffee maker. The hallway looked like a dog chew toy. Ok so there was nt anything I liked about this place. We specifically asked about non smoking rooms that DO NOT smell of smoke. The one we got instantly blasted us in the face with hot stale smoke smell. We asked for extra pillows and we were told there were nt any nor any extra towels even though we had 4 in our party and only two towels in the room. The pool area is used for hordes of smokers to gather and chain smoke outside non smoking rooms. We were told by the front desk to put one of the two towels we had under the door to block it. No breakfast offered nor coffee or anything else but I probably would not have eaten here anyway. Staff seemed disinterested we exsisted.

Poor. Our first night we did not have a working bathtub. No shower and no tub because it did n’t have a stopper. When we called. We were pretty much told to deal with it and we were stuck with this room for the whole time we stayed. Next morning was moved into another room. We were only treated nicely by the lady who moved us the next morning. Wish I had her name. She deserves credit. Second night we were continued to be treated rudely by staff when we called and asked for the WiFi info. Also our second room had blood on the curtain and the lamp shades were all slashed. The whole motel was dirty and disgusting. I have stayed in several motel hotels over my life time. It would have been more sanitary in a dumpster and better customer service by the bum that lived in it than this place. Such a horrible experience.

Will never stay again or recommend to anyone. Price was okay for area. The cleaning products were so overpowering I have breathing problems and it made the stay hard on my lungs. The toilet rocked when you sat on it. There were nothing but towels and small bars of soap no shampoo or conditioner and if you did not bring your own hard to take a shower you had none. There was only a sheet for the bedspread. No tissues in bathroom. The night staff was rude to my guest the vending machines took his money he went to her needed a soda due to the breathing issue she informed him he was not a guest but he had a key. Asked her if there was any soda available she told him to go to Circle K What was funny was they were filling the machined when we returned from dinner but did not work an hour later. No coffee maker in room but was small pot at the desk. There was water issues everywhere yellow stands around puddles in walk ways and even in the middle of the check in. Had to wait for the first guest to solve his card issue before we were waited on waited about 15 minutes. We were able to check in before the 3 of the clock check in since we arrived early. Had issues with the room key working in gate to enter the walk way they were well worn keys. On the whole it was a necessary trip and we survived but would not recommend anyone staying there nor will I ever stay there again. Last summer we stayed in a Motel 6 in Colorado it was better not the greatest but offered much more then this one.
I needed a place to sleep and I got one. They could have had clean sheets. I do n’t smoke and the room smelled like a bar.

OK but would book again. It was close to where I had to go and the staff was nice. The beds were comfy. There was no refrigerator would be prefer that to the valuables safe. The bath towels were cheap quality and small. I often found the security door to parking lot ajar. I occasionally was awaken by a dog barking in hallway outside my room at night.

Happy. Our room did have a frig and microwave. It was quiet. We had Security. The employees with the exception of one were very friendly. Big thank you to DavidThis location needs to hire more help in the housekeeping department.

Avoid it. Room smelled like drug addicts lived there Door coming off the hinges metal frame of the window came apart when I tried to open it. Staff rude and unhelpful. Manager was abusive. All of the above.
